Bubble Sort Algorithm¶

class algs.bubble_sort.bubble_sort.BubbleSort(data: Iterable[int] | None = None)¶

Bases: BaseAlgorithm

Simple bubble sort implementation.

Parameters:

data (Iterable[int], optional) – Sequence of integers to sort. If omitted, numbers are read from datasets/bubble_sort/bubble_sort.txt.

sorted¶

The sorted output produced by mine().

Type:

list[int]

mine() → List[int]¶

Sort the input data using bubble sort.

Returns:

The sorted numbers.

Return type:

list[int]
